intro.title: Featured
intro.subtitle: Academic and personal initiatives that showcase skills and passion.

cards.title: Personal Portfolio
cards.subtitle: Next.js • TypeScript • Tailwind CSS
cards.description: Personal portfolio that centralizes my experience and skills. Built with Next.js (App Router), hybrid rendering (SSR/ISR), i18n via cookies, Tailwind styling, Iconify & Lucide icon system, and JSON-driven sections (Skills, About, Projects, Contact). Includes accessible components, a glass UI aesthetic, and icon mapping per section and per tag.

cards.title: Fundación Villanueva — Website & Digital Archive
cards.subtitle: Angular • TypeScript • Tailwind CSS
cards.description: Website for Fundación Villanueva featuring Archive, Works, and Life sections. Built with Next.js (App Router), Tailwind styling, Iconify/Lucide icon system, and JSON-driven content. Includes responsive grids, accessibility, and a cohesive glass UI consistent with the portfolio.

cards.title: Universidad Andrómeda — Internship Program Landing (Proposal)
cards.subtitle: Angular • Tailwind CSS
cards.description: Landing page created as a proposal for Andromeda Ventures: an entry portal to the internship program highlighting benefits and content. Functional prototype built with Angular, styled with Tailwind, suggested deployment on Vercel, and versioned on GitHub. Fully responsive with basic Node.js support.

cards.title: Bacha — Card Game Scoreboard
cards.subtitle: Angular • Tailwind CSS
cards.description: Personal project that emulates the Bacha card game's scoreboard to simplify score tracking during matches. I keep iterating with new features. The long-term goal is to turn it into a full online Bacha app to play with friends, including rooms, rules, and rankings.

cards.title: Resérvalo — Mobile UI for Sports Reservations
cards.subtitle: Interface design • Figma prototype
cards.description: Design-first project focused on a mobile interface to book sports courts and venues in Caracas, Venezuela. Born from exploring Figma and iterated into a prototype with booking flows, scheduling, confirmations and reminders. Includes reusable components, low/high-fidelity wireframes, and interactive prototypes.

cards.title: Cineverse — Movie Hub (Collaborative)
cards.subtitle: Capstone Project • 4Geeks Academy
cards.description: Collaborative web app that consumes an external movies API and implements user authentication (sign up / log in) so users can browse titles, comment, rate, and save them to a watchlist. Front end with React/JS (routing & state), back end with Flask/Python and SQL; data validation and testing. Responsive UI.
